string.value: #p2020009# says she has something he wants to tell me...perhaps I should pay him a visit and see what could be so important.

#p2040052# agreed to find the book for me. I wonder what the book says, must be important...
I want to show this book to you, who has become quite strong in your own right. Only those who completed the 4th Job advancement are qualified to read the book. Are you interested in it?
Then go to see #b#p2040052##k of Helios Tower. I left the book with him.
If you don't like it, that's fine.
